attributes.action: make a petition about knife crime to stop it
attributes.additional_details: Because its harmful and illegal and it could ruin a young person's career so we think that it is important for you to achieve our goal on reducing knife crime
attributes.background: start a petition about knife crime to educate the young people in our community about how dangerous this is

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634860
